txt.en: Edenos is at the Palace of Eldacar.\n\nYou should bring the Orkish swords to Edenos.

'We've slain many enemy upon the battlefield of Osgiliath. I'm sending you on a mission to retrieve some of the Orkish weapons strewn about the battlefield.\n\n'We could use these by melting them down to reforge new weapons for my soldiers. What I wouldn't give to stab an Orc with his own blade. Also, it would mean that less weapons are in the hands of the enemy.'
Bring the Orkish swords to Edenos
Edenos has tasked you with searching for Orkish blades on the battlefield that can be melted down and reforged into Gondorian blades.
'Good work. I'll bring these blades to my smith. He'll make some new weapons for the next wave soldiers coming to help us battle.'
Orkish blades can be found on the Eastern side of Osgiliath.\n\nYou should collect Orkish blades.
